title: Fire Island National Seashore: Traveling Trunks
body: × Rate the Lesson Plan             Traveling Trunk Fire Island Treasure Chest   Fire Island National Seashore                  Overall Rating  Add your review    Packed with shells, sand, samples, and field guides, our treasure chest is an easy way to prepare for your Fire Island field trip or bring the Seashore to your classroom. Borrowing Instructions Please call two weeks or more in advance to reserve your treasure chest. You can then pick up your treasure chest at the Fire Island National Seashore Interpretation office in Patchogue, New York. If you are within Suffolk County, we may be able to deliver the chest to your school accompanied by a park ranger who will introduce the wonders of Fire Island. There is no charge for this service or for borrowing the treasure chest.  To schedule a ranger visit or reserve a treasure chest, please call: 631-687-4780.
